messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

bug sent tuesday october bug hi again bug apparently infested few other contracts same story with below ones can you please move them approved ll add executed date for each contract id be contract id contract id bb contract id bb contract id contract id contract id bb contract id contract id bb thanks commercial adviser old broad street en
